strange vine unto god become abominable eye thy vine brings forth soure grape lord soul hath delight therein thou art altogether untilled thy flower give ill smell thy inhabitant let wickedness imagine mischief upon bed brings forth morning cruelty weapon innocent hard heartedness defence upright wo thee thou desolate nation rejected counsel lord neglected day thy visitation wherein lord would gathered thee thou wouldst often hath lord spoken unto thee thou wilt hear call judgement hath spoken mercy hath drawn thou refusest return wilt reclaimed continues thy rebellion lord forgets work hand age generation past even since beginning hast thou land wickedness people cursed seed drinking iniquity ox drink water filling measure transgression till lord forced grievous judgment deal thee even wrath day broke forth upon thee fire indignation kindled thee thy prince cut fury thy inhabitant fell plague sword great number thou given prey thy enemy thy treasure cruell hearted took spoyle thou wast laid levell dust deep misery confusion thy lamentation sorrow heard among nation stroke lord hand heavy upon thee judgement upon thy head gave rest unto thee many year thou wast trembling leaf forsaken bough thou wast made desolate comfortless misery girded thee thy stout heart brought sorrow lord contended thee thou hast ease thy bitterness day rest thy sore trouble yet hast thou forgotten day thy distress art abundantly exalted thy sin much encreased pride thy heart become equall sodom thy transgression encreased number rebellion lord grown high mercy deliverance art thou waxe • fat thou kick lord thy heart sayes wilt thou consider lord hath wrought wilt thou call minde righteous dealing hast forgotten day thy former visitation becoming vile sight lord thy secret
